title: When were tools first used to fell trees? - Quora

response.answer_text: The need to exploit timber resources would have certainly been an early one for our ancestors.  In fact, it is speculated that there is a hereto unknown "Wood Age" that has not been fully documented. I would suggest that the Acheulean hand axes were amoung the first tools used for the task, though I can personally attest that a simple flake tool could be used to fell a small sapling.
